languages.text: {n}При слове {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Инквизиция"{/g} на лице солдата возникает благоговейный ужас.{/n} "Не могу знать! За время моего дежурства точно не прибывал! Поинтересуйтесь в штабе, Ваш высокобродие!"

traits.locale_text: {n}При слове {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Инквизиция"{/g} на лице солдата возникает благоговейный ужас.{/n} "Не могу знать! За время моего дежурства точно не прибывал! Поинтересуйтесь в штабе, Ваш высокобродие!"

languages.text: {n}At the word {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition,"{/g} the sergeant's face fills with awe.{/n} "I don't know, {mf|sir|ma'am}! There definitely haven't been any visitors like that on my watch! You might have to enquire at the headquarters, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

{n}At the word {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition,"{/g} the sergeant's face fills with awe.{/n} "I don't know, {mf|sir|ma'am}! There definitely haven't been any visitors like that on my watch! You might have to enquire at the headquarters, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

languages.text: {n}Bei dem Wort {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition"{/g} nimmt das Gesicht des Sergeants einen ehrfürchtigen Ausdruck an.{/n} "Ich weiß es nicht, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Als ich im Dienst war, gab es jedenfalls keine solchen Besucher! Ihr müsst vielleicht im Hauptquartier nachfragen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, {mf|Sir|Madam}!"
languages.original_text: {n}At the word {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition,"{/g} the sergeant's face fills with awe.{/n} "I don't know, {mf|sir|ma'am}! There definitely haven't been any visitors like that on my watch! You might have to enquire at the headquarters, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei dem Wort {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition"{/g} nimmt das Gesicht des Sergeants einen ehrfürchtigen Ausdruck an.{/n} "Ich weiß es nicht, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Als ich im Dienst war, gab es jedenfalls keine solchen Besucher! Ihr müsst vielleicht im Hauptquartier nachfragen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, {mf|Sir|Madam}!"

languages.text: {n}Lorsque vous prononcez le mot {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}« Inquisition »{/g}, le visage du sergent blêmit.{/n} « Aucune idée, {mf|monsieur|madame}. En tous cas, pas depuis que je suis de faction ici. Vous allez devoir poser la question au QG. »
languages.original_text: {n}At the word {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition,"{/g} the sergeant's face fills with awe.{/n} "I don't know, {mf|sir|ma'am}! There definitely haven't been any visitors like that on my watch! You might have to enquire at the headquarters, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque vous prononcez le mot {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}« Inquisition »{/g}, le visage du sergent blêmit.{/n} « Aucune idée, {mf|monsieur|madame}. En tous cas, pas depuis que je suis de faction ici. Vous allez devoir poser la question au QG. »

languages.text: {n}一听到{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}“审判庭”{/g}这个词，这名军士的脸上充满了敬畏之情。{/n}“我不知道，长官！我绝对没见过这样的访客！或许您得到总部去问一下，大人！”
languages.original_text: {n}At the word {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition,"{/g} the sergeant's face fills with awe.{/n} "I don't know, {mf|sir|ma'am}! There definitely haven't been any visitors like that on my watch! You might have to enquire at the headquarters, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一听到{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}“审判庭”{/g}这个词，这名军士的脸上充满了敬畏之情。{/n}“我不知道，长官！我绝对没见过这样的访客！或许您得到总部去问一下，大人！”

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}『異端審問庁』{/g}という言葉を聞いて、軍曹の顔に驚きと恐怖が広がる。{/n}「存じ上げません、陛下！私の監督中に、そのような訪問者は絶対にいませんでした！本部でお尋ねになった方がよろしいかと思います、陛下！」
languages.original_text: {n}At the word {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition,"{/g} the sergeant's face fills with awe.{/n} "I don't know, {mf|sir|ma'am}! There definitely haven't been any visitors like that on my watch! You might have to enquire at the headquarters, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}『異端審問庁』{/g}という言葉を聞いて、軍曹の顔に驚きと恐怖が広がる。{/n}「存じ上げません、陛下！私の監督中に、そのような訪問者は絶対にいませんでした！本部でお尋ねになった方がよろしいかと思います、陛下！」

languages.text: {n}Al oír la palabra {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisición"{/g}, la cara del sargento se llena de asombro.{/n} «¡No lo sé, {mf|señor|señora}! Desde luego, durante mi guardia no ha habido ningún visitante así. Tendrá que preguntar en el cuartel general, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}At the word {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition,"{/g} the sergeant's face fills with awe.{/n} "I don't know, {mf|sir|ma'am}! There definitely haven't been any visitors like that on my watch! You might have to enquire at the headquarters, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al oír la palabra {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisición"{/g}, la cara del sargento se llena de asombro.{/n} «¡No lo sé, {mf|señor|señora}! Desde luego, durante mi guardia no ha habido ningún visitante así. Tendrá que preguntar en el cuartel general, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}'Engizisyon'{/g} kelimesini duyduğu an çavuşun yüzü huşuyla doluyor.{/n} "Bilgim yok efendim! Benim nöbetimde öyle bir ziyaretçi katiyen gelmedi! Karargâha sormanız gerekebilir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
languages.original_text: {n}At the word {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}"Inquisition,"{/g} the sergeant's face fills with awe.{/n} "I don't know, {mf|sir|ma'am}! There definitely haven't been any visitors like that on my watch! You might have to enquire at the headquarters, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"
